sound.subtitle: Thunder
sound.description: Soothing thunder rumbles for relaxation or focus, connecting to nature, reducing stress, and aiding sleep. Designed to be calm, avoiding sudden claps.

sound.subtitle: Storm
sound.description: Elemental sounds of rain, thunder, and wind for comfort, memory recall, and focus. Connects to nature, creating a cozy, safe ambiance.

sound.subtitle: Log Fire
sound.description: Primal sound of crackling fire, evoking warmth, safety, and community. Aids focus, relaxation, and emotional connection. Deeper and warmer than rain sounds.

sound.subtitle: Rain on Roof
sound.description: Unique sound of rain hitting a tin roof, offering diverse listening. Combine with jungle sounds for an immersive tropical rain experience.

sound.subtitle: White Noise
sound.description: White noise (all frequencies) for hyperacusis, tinnitus, masking office noise, or sleep. Explore pink or brown noise for different sound qualities.

sound.subtitle: Brown Noise
sound.description: Mimics popular 'dark brown' noise playlists with superior, continuous, customizable sound. Better for relaxation and noise blocking than typical streaming tracks.

sound.subtitle: Wave of Sea
sound.description: Irish coastal experience with ocean waves, wind, and rain. A powerful, natural sound blocker, less fatiguing than classic white noise.

sound.subtitle: Forest
sound.description: Sounds from Poland's Bieszczady National Park, a primeval European forest. Features birds, animals, and natural elements recorded in an untouched environment.

sound.subtitle: Stream
sound.description: Immersive sounds from Ouareau Regional Park, Quebec, captured using drop-rig field recording. High-quality, undisturbed natural forest ambiance.

sound.subtitle: Coffee-Shop
sound.description: Coffee shop background noise to boost creativity and mask distracting conversations. Speech-like babble without clear words to maintain focus.

sound.subtitle: Fan
sound.description: Steady, low whir of a fan or AC, soothing and muting sudden noises. Virtual fan with customizable sound frequencies.

sound.subtitle: Office
sound.description: Vintage '90s office sounds with floppy disks and inkjet printers. Helps create a familiar, productive environment for remote work and blocks home noises.

sound.subtitle: Rain
sound.description: This soundscape captures that soothing sound that reminds us of camping trips and time spent in nature, without the inconvenience of getting wet!
